Variables
SharpNeat.​Graphs.​Acyclic
namespace SharpNeat.Graphs.Acyclic
LayerInfo
public readonly struct
LayerInfo

Represents a node and connection index that represent the last node and connection in a given layer in an acyclic graph.  The nodes and connections on an acyclic graph are ordered by the layer they are in. For more details on how the layers are determined/defined see DirectedGraphAcyclic.  Connections are defined as being in the same layer as their source node.

Functions
LayerInfo
public LayerInfo(
int endNodeIdx,
int endConnectionIdx
)

Construct a new instance.

Parameters
endNodeIdx
int

Specifies the last node in the current layer. Specifically, the index of that node plus one.

endConnectionIdx
int

Specifies the last connection in the current layer. Specifically, the index of that connection plus one.

Properties
EndNodeIdx
public int EndNodeIdx { get }

Specifies the last node in the current layer. Specifically, the index of that node plus one.

EndConnectionIdx
public int EndConnectionIdx { get }

Specifies the last connection in the current layer. Specifically, the index of that connection plus one.
